languages.text: {n}Ваши губы повторяют слова древней клятвы:{/n} "Несломленным невзгодами, отважно ступать первым во тьму, объединить и вернуть то, что было утрачено, возвыситься над невыразимыми кошмарами, твердо держать поводья судьбы, стойко идти тернистой дорогой, через боль — к величию".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ваши губы повторяют слова древней клятвы:{/n} "Несломленным невзгодами, отважно ступать первым во тьму, объединить и вернуть то, что было утрачено, возвыситься над невыразимыми кошмарами, твердо держать поводья судьбы, стойко идти тернистой дорогой, через боль — к величию.".

languages.text: {n}Your lips repeat the words of the ancient oath.{/n} "...unbroken by adversity, to walk bravely first into darkness, to unite and reclaim what was lost, to triumph over nightmares untold, to hold boldly the reins of fate, to walk steadily the road of thorns, through pain to greatness."
languages.original_text: {n}Ваши губы повторяют слова древней клятвы:{/n} "Несломленным невзгодами, отважно ступать первым во тьму, объединить и вернуть то, что было утрачено, возвыситься над невыразимыми кошмарами, твердо держать поводья судьбы, стойко идти тернистой дорогой, через боль — к величию".

{n}Your lips repeat the words of the ancient oath.{/n} "...unbroken by adversity, to walk bravely first into darkness, to unite and reclaim what was lost, to triumph over nightmares untold, to hold boldly the reins of fate, to walk steadily the road of thorns, through pain to greatness."

languages.text: {n}あなたの唇は古来からの誓いを繰り返す。{/n}「…困難に屈せず、闇の中においては勇敢に先陣を切り、失われしものを統一し取り戻し、言葉にもできぬ悪夢を征服し、大胆にも運命の手綱を握り、茨の道をたゆまず進み、苦痛の先の栄光へと」
languages.original_text: {n}Your lips repeat the words of the ancient oath.{/n} "...unbroken by adversity, to walk bravely first into darkness, to unite and reclaim what was lost, to triumph over nightmares untold, to hold boldly the reins of fate, to walk steadily the road of thorns, through pain to greatness."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの唇は古来からの誓いを繰り返す。{/n}「…困難に屈せず、闇の中においては勇敢に先陣を切り、失われしものを統一し取り戻し、言葉にもできぬ悪夢を征服し、大胆にも運命の手綱を握り、茨の道をたゆまず進み、苦痛の先の栄光へと」

languages.text: {n}你的嘴唇翕动，重复着古老的誓言。{/n}“……在逆境中永不屈服，在黑暗中辟路前行。团结一致，夺回失落的荣耀。破除无尽的噩梦，掌控命运的缰绳，踏平荆棘的道路。苦尽甘来，成就伟业。”
languages.original_text: {n}Your lips repeat the words of the ancient oath.{/n} "...unbroken by adversity, to walk bravely first into darkness, to unite and reclaim what was lost, to triumph over nightmares untold, to hold boldly the reins of fate, to walk steadily the road of thorns, through pain to greatness."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的嘴唇翕动，重复着古老的誓言。{/n}“……在逆境中永不屈服，在黑暗中辟路前行。团结一致，夺回失落的荣耀。破除无尽的噩梦，掌控命运的缰绳，踏平荆棘的道路。苦尽甘来，成就伟业。”

languages.text: {n}Tus labios repiten las palabras del antiguo juramento.{/n} «... inquebrantable ante la adversidad, {mf|el|la} primer{mf|o|a} en adentrarme en las sombras para unir y recuperar lo que se ha perdido, triunfar contra pesadillas inefables, tomar las riendas del destino y recorrer este espinoso sendero por el dolor hasta la grandeza».
languages.original_text: {n}Your lips repeat the words of the ancient oath.{/n} "...unbroken by adversity, to walk bravely first into darkness, to unite and reclaim what was lost, to triumph over nightmares untold, to hold boldly the reins of fate, to walk steadily the road of thorns, through pain to greatness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tus labios repiten las palabras del antiguo juramento.{/n} «... inquebrantable ante la adversidad, {mf|el|la} primer{mf|o|a} en adentrarme en las sombras para unir y recuperar lo que se ha perdido, triunfar contra pesadillas inefables, tomar las riendas del destino y recorrer este espinoso sendero por el dolor hasta la grandeza».

languages.text: {n}Vos lèvres répètent un à un les mots de l'antique serment.{/n} « ... inflexible dans l'adversité, d'avancer en premier dans les ténèbres, d'unir et de reprendre ce qui a été perdu, de triompher des cauchemars indicibles, de tenir les rênes du destin sans faillir, de franchir résolument les chemins tapissés d'épines pour atteindre la grandeur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Your lips repeat the words of the ancient oath.{/n} "...unbroken by adversity, to walk bravely first into darkness, to unite and reclaim what was lost, to triumph over nightmares untold, to hold boldly the reins of fate, to walk steadily the road of thorns, through pain to greatness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vos lèvres répètent un à un les mots de l'antique serment.{/n} « ... inflexible dans l'adversité, d'avancer en premier dans les ténèbres, d'unir et de reprendre ce qui a été perdu, de triompher des cauchemars indicibles, de tenir les rênes du destin sans faillir, de franchir résolument les chemins tapissés d'épines pour atteindre la grandeur. »

languages.text: {n}Deine Lippen wiederholen die Worte des uralten Eids.{/n} "... ungebrochen von Widerstand, tapfer zuerst in die Dunkelheit zu gehen, zu vereinen und zurückzuerobern, was verloren war, über ungenannte Albträume zu triumphieren, mutig die Zügel des Schicksals zu halten, stetig den Weg der Dornen zu beschreiten, durch den Schmerz hin zur Größe."
languages.original_text: {n}Your lips repeat the words of the ancient oath.{/n} "...unbroken by adversity, to walk bravely first into darkness, to unite and reclaim what was lost, to triumph over nightmares untold, to hold boldly the reins of fate, to walk steadily the road of thorns, through pain to greatness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Lippen wiederholen die Worte des uralten Eids.{/n} "... ungebrochen von Widerstand, tapfer zuerst in die Dunkelheit zu gehen, zu vereinen und zurückzuerobern, was verloren war, über ungenannte Albträume zu triumphieren, mutig die Zügel des Schicksals zu halten, stetig den Weg der Dornen zu beschreiten, durch den Schmerz hin zur Größe."

languages.text: {n}Dudaklarından kadim yeminin devamı da dökülüyor.{/n} "Zorluklardan yılmadan, karanlığa cesurca önden gidecek; kaybedilenleri geri alacak ve birleştirecek; tarifsiz kâbuslara galebe çalacak; kaderin dizginlerini korkmadan tutacak; acı dolu yollarda, istikrarlı bir şekilde ızdıraptan yüceliğe yürüyeceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}Your lips repeat the words of the ancient oath.{/n} "...unbroken by adversity, to walk bravely first into darkness, to unite and reclaim what was lost, to triumph over nightmares untold, to hold boldly the reins of fate, to walk steadily the road of thorns, through pain to greatness."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dudaklarından kadim yeminin devamı da dökülüyor.{/n} "Zorluklardan yılmadan, karanlığa cesurca önden gidecek; kaybedilenleri geri alacak ve birleştirecek; tarifsiz kâbuslara galebe çalacak; kaderin dizginlerini korkmadan tutacak; acı dolu yollarda, ızdıraptan yüceliğe istikrarlı bir şekilde yürüyeceğim."
